name: GalleryOptions
shortdesc: Deprecated for Adobe Photoshop CS3, the make photo gallery method has moved to Bridge.

property.name: layoutStyle
property.shortdesc: The style to use for laying out the web page.

property.name: emailAddress
property.shortdesc: The email address to show on the web page.

property.name: useShortExtension
property.shortdesc: Short web page extension .htm or long web page extension .html.

property.name: useUTF8Encoding
property.shortdesc: Web page should use UTF-8 encoding.

property.name: includeSubFolders
property.shortdesc: Include all files found in sub folders of the input folder.

property.name: addSizeAttributes
property.shortdesc: Add width and height attributes for images.

property.name: preserveAllMetadata
property.shortdesc: Save all of the metadata in the JPEG files.

property.name: customColorOptions
property.shortdesc: Options related to custom color settings.
